name: Broken Nights (Noisy Omens Studios)
description:
Once the game is running, press F3 and F4 (each once) to play in fullscreen!

Broken Nights is an old-school turn-based RPG. You’ll play as Isaac, a Knight in the Order of the Watchmen, solving puzzles, slaying burdensome beasts, and exploring the lands of Axis Mundi and beyond on a Quest to find what was lost!
